source.1a5d8e79: from IPython.display import HTML import pandas as pd import numpy as np import base64 def create_download_link(df, title = "Download CSV file", filename = "data.csv"): csv = df.to_csv(index=False) b64 = base64.b64encode(csv.encode()) payload = b64.decode() html = '{title}' html = html.format(payload=payload,title=title,filename=filename) return HTML(html) create_download_link(df)
source.3960a86e: This is how you will import data. Pay attention to the path.
source.3997ca78: For illustration, I'm assuming that sample_submission is my final result dataframe df. In your case, it will be whatever dataframe contains your final classification result.
